recipesJson.name: Peach Ruyan
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
I mixed this live on Fresh03 Saturday, August 1st.  After 5 days, this is delicious.  **WF Vanilla Ruyan Custard** is Wonder Flavours version of an RY4.  I love this flavor, and with the **WF SC Bourbon Aged Cream**, it is amazing.  For an added deliciousness, I am added some **WF Peach Pie & Cream** with **WF SC Bavarian Cream**.  
This is nice and creamy, light tobacco, and a delicious peach in the back.  
Enjoy  

check out **https://www.youtube.com/c/OGADIY**
https://www.diyflavorchaser.com/tam-vapes

reviews.text: Ordered the missing flavors for this recipe will definitely back to this it looks...awesome üëå Ok..I'm back this is a wonderful vape extremely smooth and full of flavor a nice change of pace for me and my usual caramel heavy tobacco recipes I usually vape I get the bourbon on the inhale and cream on the exhale I get a beautiful peach with a touch of light leaf tobacco now that being said I don't get any bakery from WF peach pie and cream thats not a bad thing just saying another bakery would bring this recipe over the top overall this is stellar üëå Awesome recipe Tammy ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
